law.catch_line: Capacity of settlor of revocable trust.
law.text: The capacity required to create, amend, revoke, or add property to a revocable trust, or to direct the actions of the trustee of a revocable trust, is the same as that required to make a will.
law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 46, effective July 15, 2014.
